name: com-easystep2-datawedge-plugin-intent-dev
description: Capacitor and Cordova plugins for Android Intents

scripts.build:capacitor: npm run clean && tsc && rollup -c rollup.config.js && cp capacitor/package.json dist/capacitor/package.json && cp -r src/android dist/capacitor/android
scripts.build:cordova: npm run clean && tsc && cp cordova/plugin.xml dist/cordova/plugin.xml && cp -r www dist/cordova/www && cp -r src/android dist/cordova/src

author: H.W. Blom
